short-description: A modern, performant, and highly customizable React and React Native component library, inspired by Geist UI and Vercel Design.
description: A complete suite of styled-components designed to create consistent and elegant user interfaces, maintained by Tonight Pass.
long-description:
Kitchn is a comprehensive UI component library that accelerates the development of modern web and mobile applications.

Inspired by Geist UI and Vercel Design, it stands out with its minimalist approach and ease of use, offering a collection of optimized components built with styled-components and TypeScript.

Each component is designed to be modular, performant, and highly customizable, allowing development teams to quickly create consistent user interfaces while maintaining an excellent developer experience.
